name: Clonazepam

contraindications.text: clonazepam available tablet . tablets administered water swallowing tablet whole .

warningsAndPrecautions: clonazepam tablets usp 1 mg blue , round , flat faced , beveled edge , debossed “ c 1 ” one side plain . supplied follows : ndc : 60760-300-30 bottle 30 store 25°c ( 77°f ) ; excursions permitted 15° 30°c ( 59° 86°f ) . [ usp controlled room temperature ] .
adverseReactions: clonazepam used patients history sensitivity benzodiazepines , patients biochemical evidence significant liver disease . may used patients open angle glaucoma receiving appropriate therapy contraindicated acute narrow angle glaucoma .
contraindications_original: Clonazepam is available as a tablet. The tablets should be administered with water by swallowing the tablet whole.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Clonazepam tablets USP 1 mg are blue, round, flat faced, beveled edge, debossed with “C 1” on one side and plain on the other. They are supplied as follows:
                  
                  
                  NDC: 60760-300-30 bottle of 30
                  
                  
                  
                  
                  Store at 25°C (77°F); excursions permitted to 15° to 30°C (59° to 86°F). [See USP Controlled Room Temperature].
adverseReactions_original: Clonazepam should not be used in patients with a history of sensitivity to benzodiazepines, nor in patients with clinical or biochemical evidence of significant liver disease. It may be used in patients with open angle glaucoma who are receiving appropriate therapy but is contraindicated in acute narrow angle glaucoma.
